item.description:
Looks like a lot of this early season snow has southern NH in its bullseye. Anyone want to hit Mt Sunapee?
I will drive up from Boston but will continue north after riding so I can't help with the carpool. Please list if your can drive AND/OR would like to drive. We will meet in the main Base Lodge at 10am.

This is an easy day trip - only 90 minutes from Boston.

Sunapee is famous for its great grooming, get ready to lay down some smooth carves.

To check out directions, trail map, conditions:
http://www.mountsunap...

Tom

p.s. (after Sunapee) I will be staying in North Conway through New Years. Only $20 per night to stay at the Wedeln Ski House - ask me for more details.
item.how_to_find_us: 10 am on first Floor of main base lodge - black jacket with goofy fur line hood
item.name: Mt Sunapee - it's time to ride
